title: HI-SEAS Grand Slam Monofilament Fishing Line - Strong & Abrasion Resistant in Clear, Pink, Green, Smoke Blue, Fluorescent Yellow Freshwater & Saltwater â€“ Quarter Pound Spool
features: USE: A multi-purpose fishing line designed for the best sensitivity and strength for all anglers. Strong, supple, and extra-tough, this mono fishing line is ideal for fresh and saltwater fishing.

QUALITY: This super strong mono line has a controlled stretch which means it adds fighting power to your reel, not give away the fish. It is abrasion resistant so it can withstand those savage beasts that are just waiting to take your bait.
COLOR: Clear fishing line best to use in clear water or for cautious fish.
DEPENDABLE: A classic tackle choice for saltwater and freshwater game fish, this extra-smooth, absolutely abrasion resistant super strong monofilament is ideal for most species.
description: When you need ultimate fighting power, nothing delivers like the Grand Slam Monofilament Line. This super strong line is extra tough, thanks to its superior performance construction, and abrasion resistant material that reduces friction against Guides, Reels and Hooks. Perfect on conventional and spinning tackle, this line allows for great sensitivity and control that you need when fighting big game fish in any water condition.
